name: ACB (Air Circuit Breaker) NW 2000A
description_id: Air Circuit Breaker (ACB) Schneider Electric tipe Masterpact NW dengan kapasitas pemutusan tinggi.
description_en: Schneider Electric Masterpact NW type Air Circuit Breaker (ACB) with high breaking capacity.

name: Inverter FR-A800 3-Phase
description_id: Inverter Mitsubishi seri FR-A800 untuk kontrol motor presisi tinggi dan heavy-duty applications.
description_en: Mitsubishi FR-A800 series inverter for high-precision motor control and heavy-duty applications.

name: Kabel NYY 4x95mm²
description_id: Kabel tegangan rendah NYY berisolasi PVC untuk instalasi tanam langsung bawah tanah maupun rak kabel.
description_en: Low voltage NYY PVC insulated cable for direct burial installations as well as cable racks.

name: Magnetic Contactor NXC-100
description_id: Kontaktor magnetik handal untuk penyambungan dan pemutusan beban daya jarak jauh industri.
description_en: Reliable magnetic contactor for remote connection and disconnection of industrial power loads.

name: MCCB Formula A2 250A
description_id: Molded Case Circuit Breaker (MCCB) kompak untuk perlindungan instalasi listrik dari arus pendek.
description_en: Compact Molded Case Circuit Breaker (MCCB) for electrical installation protection against short circuits.

name: Timer Relay H3CR-A
description_id: Solid-state timer presisi multi-fungsi untuk otomasi panel kontrol industri.
description_en: Multi-functional precision solid-state timer for industrial control panel automation.
